subsection.name: Mac
subsection.p: Right click on Eclipse.app. Select show package contents. Navigate to Contens/Resources/Java

subsection.name: common
subsection.p: Expand your download. You should now have a folder named com.objectstyle.wolips_0.8.8. The version may differ.
Move the folder to the Eclipse plugin folder.

subsection.name: ant
subsection.p: Replace the ant.jar and the jakarta-ant-1.4.1-optional.jar in the ant plugin with the jars from the ant 1.5.* distribution. (jakarta-ant-1.4.1-optional.jar should be replace with optional.jar)
